text: Arvin Slagter is a basketball player from Netherlands. Slagter competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Arvin SLAGTER He was born on 19 October 1985.Arvin Slagter == References == Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:Dutch basketball players Category:Medalists at the 2024 Summer Olympics Category:Olympians for the Netherlands Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Netherlands Category:Point guards Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam
title: Arvin Slagter
